attributes.action: Put the new diabetic sensor pads on the NHS!.
attributes.additional_details: Type 1 Diabetics have to inject anywhere up to 4/5 times a day, every single day!. As well as prick there fingers up to 4 time a day to check there blood. Put the new blood sugar sensor pads and Monitor on the NHS! Now! #nomoreneedles #halfthepain
attributes.background: There are over 4 million diabetics in the UK,  who's life's can be improved dramatically with the New blood sugar sensor pads. They cost £96 a month!!, and should be made FREE to diabetics on the NHS!.
